required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A New Drug Used for Advanced Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Study of Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics of TQ-B3203

brief_summary.textblock: To identify the safety and tolerance of TQ-B3203.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: each 42 days up to intolerance the toxicity or progression disease (up to 24 months)
